meanings.sent1: The store offered markdowns on all their products.
meanings.sent2: I love finding markdowns when I go shopping.
meanings.sent3: The markdowns at the store made everyone rush to buy things.
meanings.sent4: The markdowns were like a treasure hunt for bargain hunters.
meanings.sent5: The colorful signs advertising markdowns caught my eye immediately.

meanings.definition: To lower the price of something
meanings.sent1: Shops often markdown products to attract more customers.
meanings.sent2: I decided to markdown the prices to increase sales.
meanings.sent3: When I markdown prices, customers always seem happier.
meanings.sent4: She had to markdown the items quickly before the new stock arrived.
meanings.sent5: The decision to markdown the goods was a strategic move for the business.
